item.description:
Hello,

On Thursday, April 27, at 7 pm, there will be a Wikimania meeting at the Berkman Center for Internet & Society, 1587 Massachusetts Avenue, Cambridge, MA. One of the Wikimania planners, Phoebe, is going to be in the Boston area for a few days and is hoping we can gather people together to talk face-to-face about Wikimania stuff.
Please join us if you can!

Some of you might realize this is the time and place for a weekly blog group. We're using that meeting to discuss Wikimania since there is some overlap between the groups and Berkman is providing support for the conference.

If the equipment is working right, we might be webcasting. People should be on IRC, too, probably in the wikimania channel on freenode.net.

More info about the meeting will be on the Wikipedia:Meetup/Boston wiki (http://en.wikipedia.o...) and the Thursday Meetings at Berkman blog (http://blogs.law.harv...) closer to the meeting date.

Happy spring!

j

For more information, see http://en.wikipedia.o...
item.name: Wikimania Planning Meeting
